defs.script:
{"code": "quadrantChart
 %% Quadrant chart for IT Project Risk Assessment
 %% All coordinates must be between 0 and 1
 
 title IT Project Risk Assessment Matrix
 x-axis Low Probability --> High Probability
 y-axis Low Impact --> High Impact
 
 %% Quadrant 1: Top-right (High Probability, High Impact)
 quadrant-1 High Priority Risks
 %% Quadrant 2: Top-left (Low Probability, High Impact)
 quadrant-2 Catastrophic but Rare
 %% Quadrant 3: Bottom-left (Low Probability, Low Impact)
 quadrant-3 Negligible Risks
 %% Quadrant 4: Bottom-right (High Probability, Low Impact)
 quadrant-4 Frequent but Manageable
 
 %% Plot points: [x-coordinate, y-coordinate]
 %% x: 0 (low probability) to 1 (high probability)
 %% y: 0 (low impact) to 1 (high impact)
 
 %% Risks for Quadrant 1 (High Probability, High Impact)
 Data breach from cyberattack: [0.85, 0.9]
 Key developer leaving project: [0.75, 0.8]
 Major scope creep: [0.7, 0.7]
 
 %% Risks for Quadrant 2 (Low Probability, High Impact)
 Complete system failure: [0.2, 0.95]
 Natural disaster affecting data center: [0.1, 0.85]
 Regulatory compliance changes: [0.3, 0.75]
 
 %% Risks for Quadrant 4 (High Probability, Low Impact) - Mapped from User's "Quadrant 3"
 Minor bugs in non-critical features: [0.7, 0.4]
 Slight schedule delays: [0.8, 0.3]
 Team communication issues: [0.65, 0.25]
 
 %% Risks for Quadrant 3 (Low Probability, Low Impact) - Mapped from User's "Quadrant 4"
 Printer malfunction: [0.25, 0.2]
 Office Wi-Fi issues: [0.15, 0.1]
 Coffee machine breakdown: [0.35, 0.05]", "theme": "default"}
